result.execSummary:
The defendant Mitchell J. Dennis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

civilJdgmts.propDescr: This judgment is for fines, court costs and restitution that you were ordered to pay through Dept of Corrections - if not paid during probation - or you get revoked  and have not paid in full - you will be required to pay to the Clerk of Courts any unpaid amount plus interest.

supervisions.notes: Withheld sentence  2 years probation conditions of probation costs $243.00, 30 days county jail with huber effective 8-1-14 at 3pm 2 days credit,   Absolute Sobriety  No drug use without a valid prescription.  complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent.

miscConds.notes: $243.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Defendant Mitchell J. Dennis in court with attorney Martin Jarvis.  John M Yackel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts,  Court amends ct#1 to Battery Misd,  and adds ct#2 Disorderly conduct Misd,  DEF pleads NC to both counts, court finds DEF guilty, Court withholds sentence on ct #1 and ct#2, places DEF on 2 years probation conditions of probation costs $243.00 on each count, additional conditions of CT#1 30 days county jail with huber report to jail 8-1-14  by 3pm, with 2 days credit   Absolute Sobriety  No drug use without a valid prescription.  complete any counseling deemed appropriate by agent, report to probation today.
